meanings.definition: A social gathering or event held at a nightclub.
meanings.sent1: Last night, we had a fun clubbing event at the nightclub.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy going clubbing with my friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The clubbing at the nightclub was lively and exciting.
meanings.sent4: The clubbing scene at the nightclub was like a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent5: The clubbing experience at the nightclub was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The act of striking someone or something with a club.
meanings.sent1: The clubbing of the nail with a hammer was loud.
meanings.sent2: The police officer used clubbing to control the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The clubbing of the drumsticks created a rhythmic beat.
meanings.sent4: The clubbing of the waves against the shore was soothing.
meanings.sent5: The clubbing sound echoed through the forest.

meanings.definition: The act of joining or becoming a member of a club.
meanings.sent1: Her clubbing into the book club was a great decision.
meanings.sent2: I am considering clubbing into the local fitness club.
meanings.sent3: His clubbing into the chess club surprised his friends.
meanings.sent4: The clubbing into the exclusive club felt like a milestone.
meanings.sent5: The clubbing into the club opened up new opportunities.
